resources.string: Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
When Privacy Guard is enabled, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for a built-in app, the app will not be able to access or provide personal data. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Enable by default for newly-installed apps
Manage which apps have access to your personal data

In this screen you can choose which apps Privacy Guard should be active for by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs. Long pressing an app\'s entry opens its app details screen.\n\nBuilt-in apps are not shown by default but can be revealed by selecting the respective menu option.
Allowing apps to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Include the foreground task when clearing all recents
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Show a Google search bar in the recents screen
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Customize clock styles and date format
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Press on color below to apply
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Configure what icons are shown on the status bar
Show two main tiles on the first row
Show three tiles on each row
Enable advanced settings for location in Quick Settings
Show weather in the quick settings panel header
Battery bar position and color customization
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Lights in do not disturb mode
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Show unaccounted and over-counted usage in battery statistics.
Adjust the brightness by sliding across the status bar
Auto expand notifications on apps that support it
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Enable the Android Debug Bridge (adb) interface
Display a notification when USB or network debugging is enabled
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Use volume to wake or control music
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device\nOverrides playback control
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Enable adjustment of max lockscreen notifications
Change the shortcuts on lock screen to whatever you want
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Makes the recents screen go into immersive mode

Enable to colorize all icons, disable to colorize only the monochrome icons
Change the default font of the lock screen clock widget
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Doze pulse will be triggered by pick up gesture sensor events
Pick up gesture sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by significant motion sensor events
Significant motion sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Predefined doze repeat intervals (normally [1s,10s,30s,60s,120s]) will be used (default)
Doze will only pulse once per notification
Brightness level of doze pulse screen (% of max allowed brightness)
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"

Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
